explanation: [0-0] A brown river with an embankment on the left side. There is a road on the embankment, with a white house on the side farther from the river. A straight tree is planted closer to the river, with a silver hatchback parked on its left and a dark blue hatchback on its right. A black SUV loses control while turning and sends the dark blue hatchback off the embankment into the water, creating a splash. At the same time, another black SUV approaches the intersection. White subtitles appear at the top of the screen: "When there is an emergency".

[0-3] The scene switches to the passenger seat inside a car with a black and white interior. Water streams down the windshield as a person inside repeatedly hits the glass with their hand, then starts kicking it with their foot in a gray sock. Three inspection stickers - yellow, blue, and green - are attached to the upper right corner of the windshield. Then, another pair of hands slaps the glass on the driver's side. The car's interior is pitch black.

[0-3] The scene switches to the passenger seat inside a car with a black and white interior. The car's interior is pitch black.

[3-9] The scene changes to the inside of a car with a black and brown interior. A person wearing a white mask and beige clothing is sitting in the driver's seat, pulling at the seatbelt with both hands. They then strike the sunroof with a clenched left fist and open right hand. A blue sky is visible through the sunroof. The scene cuts back to the person in the driver's seat, now turned to the right, pulling the seatbelt across their chest with their left hand and repeatedly pressing the release button with their right hand. However, the seatbelt does not release. The camera zooms in on the door handle as the person repeatedly pulls on it with both hands, trying to open the door, but to no avail. The camera then moves to the steering wheel and zooms in as the person takes out a small black tool, aims it at the seatbelt, and forcefully cuts it. They then aim the tool at the left car window.

[9-11] The scene cuts to the inside of a car with a completely black interior. A person wearing a white glove on their right hand holds the same tool against the left window, instantly shattering it. The scene immediately shifts indoors, where a person holding the black tool in their right hand forcefully thrusts it downwards onto a round piece of glass placed on a table. The glass shatters into small pieces and flies outward.

[11-13] The scene switches back to the car with the black and brown interior. The person holds the black tool in their right hand and covers it with a transparent protector using their left hand. The car's steering wheel and dashboard are visible in the background. Then, holding the tool at both ends, they gently place it on top of the dashboard.

[13-15] The scene changes to the exterior of a silver car. A person wearing blue and white rubber gloves is using a blue tool to gesture at the car's already shattered side window. The camera cuts to a seatbelt being pulled out of the car. The person, holding the blue tool in their right hand with their palm facing up, touches the seatbelt with their index and ring fingers. They then cut the seatbelt with the tool and use their left hand to display the cut portion.

[15-17] The following scene takes place at the rear left side of another silver hatchback. A man wearing a black short-sleeved shirt and blue and white rubber gloves on his right hand holds the tool and presses it against the car's rear window, causing it to shatter. He then repeatedly strikes the same window with the tool, causing further cracks and a small hole to appear.

[15-17] The following scene takes place at the rear left side of another silver hatchback. [17-19] The final scene occurs inside a car with a black interior. The person, seated in the driver's seat, holds the black tool in their left hand and peels off a red sticker from its base with their right hand, revealing an adhesive. Using both hands, they then gently stick the tool onto the dashboard.
